channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: On the front lines with Ukraine's drone hunters
item.description: Ukrainian military drone interceptors are battling Russia in the skies.

item.title: WATCH: Suspect arrested in Jan. 6 pipe bomb case, sources say
item.description: Investigators have been working to crack the case for almost five years.

item.title: Man charged in shooting death of Utah "No Kings" protester
item.description: Ah Loo, known as Afa, was a successful fashion designer and former "Project Runway" contestant who devoted his life to celebrating artists from the Pa...

item.title: FBI makes arrest in investigation into pipe bombs placed in DC on eve of Jan. 6 riot, AP source says
item.description: The FBI has made an arrest in its nearly 5-year-old investigation into who placed pipe bombs in Washington before the Jan. 6, 2021, riot at the U.S. C...

item.title: Boat strike survivors were trying to climb back on before follow-up attack, source says
item.description: The White House confirmed this week that there was a second strike, but denied that Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth ordered it.

item.title: FBI arrests suspect in 2021 D.C. pipe bomb case, sources say
item.description: Sources say the FBI has arrested a man suspected of placing pipe bombs outside RNC and DNC headquarters on the eve of the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot.

item.title: WATCH: Bird flies into TV reporter's face as she delivers a piece to camera
item.description: "My eye is all good," she later told concerned viewers.

item.title: Home prices could dip in 22 U.S. cities next year, report says. See where.
item.description: A new report from Realtor.com projects that the housing market will shift in a more buyer-friendly direction in 2026.

item.title: US filings for jobless benefits fall to 191,000, lowest since September of 2022
item.description: U.S. applications for unemployment benefits fell to their lowest level in more than three years last week, potentially complicating the Federal Reserv...

item.title: Suspect arrested in Jan. 6 pipe bomb case: Sources
item.description: Authorities have made an arrest in connection with the placement of two pipe bombs outside RNC and DNC headquarters the night before the Jan. 6, 2021,...

item.title: Should you open a Trump account for your child? Here's what experts say.
item.description: Trump accounts offer a new tax-preferred way for families to save money for their kids. Here are the pros and cons.

item.title: A quiet corner of Arkansas has become a hot spot for US immigration crackdown, AP finds
President Trump’s contempt shocks the country’s largest Somali community
